sentences.en: Carrie's little soldier friend, Miss Osborne , seeing her succeeding, had become a sort of satellite.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉正在走红.她那个演小兵的朋友奥斯本小姐, 已经变得像是她的仆人了.

sentences.en: Each succeeding day calls for an additional $ 3.83 interest per day.
sentences.cn: 每延误一天,要追加利息3美元83美分.

sentences.en: Each succeeding fabricated box is erected on trolleys.
sentences.cn: 每段预拼的箱梁安装在小平车上.

sentences.en: He was intent on murder and he came within an ace of succeeding.
sentences.cn: 他一心想杀人并且差点就得逞了。

sentences.en: I think he stands a good chance of succeeding in the experiment.
sentences.cn: 我认为他很有可能取得实验的成功.

sentences.en: In the process of their careful watching and recording the celestial movements the Chinese provided valuable and interesting information for succeeding generations.
sentences.cn: 古代中国人在仔细观察、认真记录天体运动的过程里，为后代留下了宝贵而又有趣的资料。

sentences.en: Judging by the opinion polls, he seems to be succeeding.
sentences.cn: 从民意测验来看，他似乎胜券在握。

sentences.en: Little did I dream of succeeding so well.
sentences.cn: 我做梦也想不到如此圆满的成功.

sentences.en: Money tends to flow to businesses that are already succeeding.
On that and succeeding days, similar movements occurred in various cities.
sentences.cn: 在那天及随后的几天中, 类似的运动在几个城市发生.

sentences.en: Over the succeeding weeks things went from bad to worse.
sentences.cn: 接下来的几周，事情越来越糟。

sentences.en: Pastures cannot be justified solely because of their contribution to succeeding tillage crops.
sentences.cn: 不能仅仅因为草场提供成功的耕种作物,就认为它是合理的.

sentences.en: Tess tries to keep me out of trouble, not always succeeding.
sentences.cn: 苔丝总想给我解围, 但并不是每次都成功.

sentences.en: There is little probability of his succeeding / that he will succeed.
There's no greater happiness than that of succeeding in one's career.
sentences.cn: 最大的快乐莫过于事业上的成功.

sentences.en: They have got much credit for succeeding in the experiment.
sentences.cn: 他们因实验成功而大受赞扬.

phrases.tran_cn: 成功；在…方面成功；顺利完成
成功地做了…，成功地做某事

trans.tran_cn: 成功( succeed的现在分词 )，完成，继承，达到目的
